118a7('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
118b1('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
118b2('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems
118b3('bum): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis
118b4('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
118b5('bum): bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de la ci zhes bgyi
118b6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'dus ma bgyis te/ 'dus ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags so// ma 'ongs pa ma lags so// da ltar byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi
118b7('bum): 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'dus ma bgyis pa po de yang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
119a1('bum): ldan 'das bdug gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs
119a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i
119a3('bum): 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
119a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa me dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom
119a5('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /
119a6('bum): / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
119a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
119b1('bum): dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
119b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom
119b3('bum): l dan 'das bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge
119b4('bum): 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams/
119b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang
119b6('bum): bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
119b7('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs
120a1('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
120a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom
120a3('bum): l dan 'das bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
120a4('bum): bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
120a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
120a6('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/
120a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma
120b1('bum): mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis/
120b2('bum): bas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa
120b3('bum): ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/
120b4('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
120b5('bum): mchis so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/
120b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de yang gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam
120b7('bum): rno ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
121a1('bum): 'am sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i
121a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
121a3('bum): tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
121a4('bum): rkyen gyis tsher ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams
121a5('bum): sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am
121a6('bum): sred pa 'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson
121a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phri stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam
121b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/
121b2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa
121b3('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong
121b4('bum): ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am
121b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam
121b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge
121b7('bum): 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po
122a1('bum): 'am snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
122a2('bum): dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / sgyu ma zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang
122a3('bum): brjod du ma mchis so/ / mig yor zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zla zhes bgyi
122a4('bum): ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper
122a5('bum): na nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du
122a6('bum): ma mchis so/ / me zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming
122a7('bum): gang gi kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang
122b1('bum): brjod du ma mchis so/ / chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi dbyings zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos
122b2('bum): gnas nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / chos skyon med pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i
122b3('bum): ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming
122b4('bum): ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni
122b5('bum): gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming
122b6('bum): ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis
122b7('bum): shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / rnam par grol ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
123a1('bum): ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs
123a2('bum): ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos
123a3('bum): zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni
123a4('bum): gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
123a5('bum): du ma mchis so/ / rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// /
123a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag
123a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang dge ba
123b1('bum): 'am mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
123b2('bum): gam bdag ma mchis pa 'am/ zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi ba 'am/ dben pa 'am/ mi dben pa 'am/ dngos po 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis
123b3('bum): pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste
123b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gis 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
123b5('bum): de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming dem mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
123b6('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de/ rnam
123b7('bum): pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / 'gyod pa ma mchis la/ mi
124a1('bum): 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs
124a2('bum): par bgyi ste/ gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
124a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi
124a4('bum): bgyi'o/ / des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des
124a5('bum): lce la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des lus la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sgra la gnas par mi
124a6('bum): bgyi'o/ / des dri la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rol gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi
124a7('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par
124b1('bum): shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas/
124b2('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sku'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
124b3('bum): des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
124b4('bum): des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
124b5('bum): tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
124b6('bum): des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chu'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des me'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
124b7('bum): des nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas
125a1('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ / des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi//
125a2('bum): des reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas par mi
125a3('bum): bgyi'o/ / des skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong
125a4('bum): ste gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs
125a5('bum): so/ / tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
125a6('bum): tshor ba'o/ / 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes
125a7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong panyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong
125b1('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par
125b2('bum): shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam
125b3('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi
125b4('bum): bgyi'o/ / des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de yang 'di ltar
125b5('bum): mig mig gis stong ste/ mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags/ mig las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig go//
125b6('bum): rna ba rna bas stong ste/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o//
125b7('bum): sna snas stong ste/ sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce lces
126a1('bum): stong ste/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags/ lce las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus/
126a2('bum): lus kyis stong ste/ lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags/ lus las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lus so//

132b5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
132b6('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
132b7('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags
133a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na sang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan
133a2('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
133a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/ dbang po lnga la gnas par mi bgyi ste// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dab
133a4('bum): po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dbang po rnams ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dbang po rnams kyang
133a5('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po
133a6('bum): rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs lnga la gnas par mi bgyi/
133a7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams ma lags/ stobs rnams las
133b1('bum): / gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
133b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
133b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/
133b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan
133b5('bum): lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
133b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
133b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste/ lam gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
134a1('bum): lam ma lags/ lam las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lam yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
134a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

134a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
134b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong

134b6('bum): pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa

136a1('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyis/ daci'i mang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
136a2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
136a3('bum): smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags/ nus par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
136a4('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa

136b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma

136b6('bum): lags pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mi

137a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/

137a6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa
137a7('bum): chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa
137b1('bum): de yang byams pa chen po ma lags/ de yang snying rje chen po ma lags/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong

137b3('bum): tshebyams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
137b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

137b6('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs

138a1('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon par
138a2('bum): bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/

138a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par
138a6('bum): shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
138a7('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa
138b1('bum): nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa
138b2('bum): rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams la gnas
138b3('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
138b4('bum): pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
138b5('bum): gyi sgo rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la
138b6('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par
138b7('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
139a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs
139a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
139a3('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go/
139a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
139a5('bum): de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag
139a6('bum): pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar
139a7('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
139b1('bum): ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang
139b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139b3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mi rtag
139b4('bum): go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi
139b5('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
139b6('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mi rtag go/
139b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// // des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
140a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa
140a2('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mi
140a3('bum): rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
140a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste
140a5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong ba nyid dang lag pa de yang rnam par
140a6('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
140a7('bum): mi rtag pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes brgya
140b1('bum): bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar
140b2('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid
140b3('bum): gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
140b4('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug
140b5('bum): bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
140b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma
140b7('bum): lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan
141a1('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
141a2('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid

146a7('bum): pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
146b1('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du
146b2('bum): byed mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed
146b3('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan
146b4('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
146b5('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam
146b6('bum): par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma
146b7('bum): med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par
147a1('bum): shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
147a2('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
147a3('bum): tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste//
147a4('bum): gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs
147a5('bum): smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
147a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
147a7('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
147b1('bum): pa de yang tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor
147b2('bum): ba smon pa med pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes
147b3('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
147b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid ma lags//
147b5('bum): 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
147b6('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des
147b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed smon pa med
148a1('bum): pa nyid 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed
148a2('bum): smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
148a3('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab
148a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa
148a5('bum): nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par
148a6('bum): shes pa smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do// /
148a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
148b1('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
148b2('bum): ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs/
148b3('bum): dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do//
148b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
148b5('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dben
148b6('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba dben pa nyid
148b7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
149a1('bum): tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
149a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes
149a3('bum): dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
149a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed
149a5('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong po nyid
149a6('bum): gang lags pa de yang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa
149a7('bum): nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
149b1('bum): bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa
149b2('bum): dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dben
149b3('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
149b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
149b5('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
149b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin
149b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
150a1('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
150a2('bum): nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags
150a3('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
150a4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong
150a6('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos kyi dbyings kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
150a7('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
150b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
150b2('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar chos sgron med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na
150b3('bum): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chan
150b4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
150b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ yang dag
150b6('bum): pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
150b7('bum): kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas
151a1('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag
151a2('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gi rab gyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
151a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tsher ba la
151a4('bum): gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
151a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
151a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag
151a7('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
151b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
151b2('bum): yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
151b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/
151b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
151b5('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mig la gnas na/ de mig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
151b6('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
151b7('bum): mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba la gnas na/ de rna ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spod do//
152a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi
152a2('bum): ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna la gnas na/ de sna mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
152a3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce la gnas na/ de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
152a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu
152a5('bum): bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus la gnas na/ de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
152a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid
152a7('bum): la gnas na/ de yid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
152b1('bum): dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur/ te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
152b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag ga ri bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
152b4('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
152b5('bum): mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sgra la gnas na/ de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
152b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
152b7('bum): pa'i yid kyis dri la gnas na/ de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
153a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rol gnas na/ de ro mngon par
153a2('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
153a3('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg la gnas na/ de reg mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
153a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
153a5('bum): kyis chos la gnas na/ de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
153a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
153a7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
153b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon
153b2('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
153b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
153b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
