252b1('bum): pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
252b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
252b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
252b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
252b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
252b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
252b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
253a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
253a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid
253a3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
253a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
253a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
253a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
253b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
253b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
253b3('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces
253b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus
253b5('bum): te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
253b6('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
253b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
254a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
254a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
254a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
254a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa
254a5('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
254a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
254a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
254b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
254b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
254b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
254b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
254b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
254b6('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes
254b7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus
255a1('bum): te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
255a2('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
255a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
255a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
255a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
255a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

255b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
255b3('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus
255b4('bum): te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
255b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha
255b6('bum): mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
255b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

257a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

257b6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus
257b7('bum): te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
258a1('bum): pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

258a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

258a6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
258a7('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis chor
258b1('bum): ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
258b2('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
258b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
258b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
258b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar
258b6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
258b7('bum): gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
259a1('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
259a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
259a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
259a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba rtag ces
259a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg
259a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
259a7('bum): mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
259b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
259b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
259b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
259b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
259b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
259b6('bum): pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
259b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
260a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba rtag ces bgyi bar
260a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg
260a4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
260a5('bum): mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
260a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
260a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
260b1('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
260b2('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
260b3('bum): pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
260b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
260b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
260b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi
260b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te/
261a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
261a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
261a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
261a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
261a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
261a6('bum): gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
261a7('bum): mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
261b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
261b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
261b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
261b4('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi
261b5('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus
261b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
261b7('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
262a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes
262a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te/
262a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
262a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
262a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
262a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
262b1('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
262b2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
262b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
262b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
262b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
262b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
262b7('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
263a1('bum): ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
263a2('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
263a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
263a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
263a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ma zhi zhes
263a6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus
263a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
263b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
263b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
263b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
263b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
263b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
263b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
264a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
264b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
264b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
264b3('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
264b4('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
264b5('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
264b6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
264b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams mi dben zhes brgya
265a1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
265a2('bum): bas me'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
265a3('bum): mkhas pas me'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
265a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
265a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
265a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
265a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
265b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
265b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
265b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhrapas me'i kham dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
265b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
265b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
265b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
265b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
266a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes
266a2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi kham
266a3('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
266a4('bum): rlung gi khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
266a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
266a6('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
266a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
266b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
266b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
266b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
266b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
266b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

266b7('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar
267a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

268a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam
268a3('bum): par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu gcig pa//

273a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
273a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tsher bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
274a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
274a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
274a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
274a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
274a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
274a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do//
274a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la
274b1('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
274b2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces brgya
274b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag med
274b4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa
274b5('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len
274b6('bum): pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa
274b7('bum): len pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
275a1('bum): mkhas pas len pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
275a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
275a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
275a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
275a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

275b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang/

275b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
275b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

276a6('bum): mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
276a7('bum): mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

276b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
276b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

276b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
277a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

277b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
277b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol

277b4('bum): mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

278a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

280a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

280a4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha
280a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das kal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
280a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
280a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
280b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar
280b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan
280b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
280b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
280b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
281a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol
281a2('bum): tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

287a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

287b2('bum): nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
287b3('bum): pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

294b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
294b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
294b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
294b5('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes
294b6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs
294b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
295a1('bum): mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
295a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

297b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

298b1('bum): pas yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

301a1('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs/
301a2('bum): rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
301a3('bum): pas stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
301a4('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
301a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
301a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams ci zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
301a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
301b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
301b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
301b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
301b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan
301b5('bum): lag rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
301b6('bum): mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
301b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
302a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
302a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar
302a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan
302a4('bum): lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
302a5('bum): mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
302a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
302a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
302b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
302b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces brgya
302b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags
302b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

308a7('bum): dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
308b1('bum): mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

308b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
308b4('bum): med pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
308b5('bum): pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
308b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
308b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo
309a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
309a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar
309a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo
309a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
309a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
309a6('bum): rongo/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
309a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
309b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
309b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
309b3('bum): smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
309b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
309b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
309b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
309b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
310a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnam
310a2('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas

315b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

378b7('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
379a1('bum): yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na yang stong pa nyid med
379a2('bum): de stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
379a3('bum): pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab
379a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang
379a5('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang phyi stong pa nyid
379a6('bum): med/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma
379a7('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
379b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid
379b2('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las/
379b3('bum): gud na yang chen po stong pa nyid med/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi
379b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
379b5('bum): nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang

380a6('bum): med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de

380b1('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med/ chos thams cad stong pa/

380b6('bum): pastong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med
380b7('bum): de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid la
381a1('bum): gud na yang ngo bo 'ang stong pa nyid med/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ jo ba da stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dngos
381a2('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid reng / dngos po med pa'i
381a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i
381a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med
381a5('bum): de/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ stong
381a6('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong
381a7('bum): pa nyid do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
381b1('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dbang po rnams ma yin/
381b2('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang dbang po rnams med/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dbang po/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin/

381b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las
381b5('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags
381b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
381b7('bum): pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden
382a1('bum): pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
382a2('bum): bden pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang bsam gtan rnams med//
382a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshad med pa rnams ma
382a4('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshad med pa rnams med/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
382a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
382a6('bum): 'jug pa med/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
382a7('bum): 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par thar pa med/ rnam par thar pa las gud
382b1('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mthar/

382b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid

382b6('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
382b7('bum): med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mngon par shes pa rnams med/ mngon
383a1('bum): par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
383a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin/
383a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/
383a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
383a5('bum): de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gung na yang stong pa nyid med de/
383a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
383a7('bum): gud na yang mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa
383b1('bum): bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang
383b2('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen po ma yin
383b3('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang byams pa chen po med/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snying rje ches
383b4('bum): po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang snying rje chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang snying rje chen po med/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje
383b5('bum): chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
383b6('bum): las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid//
383b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang thams cad
384a1('bum): shes pa nyid med/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na yang spong ba nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
384a2('bum): do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ lam gyi rnam pa
384a3('bum): shes pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong
384a4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang
384a5('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
384a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
384a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
384b1('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ / mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa
384b2('bum): yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
384b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spong la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs
384b4('bum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
384b5('bum): bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
384b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang
384b7('bum): spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ / spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams
385a1('bum): cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
385a2('bum): pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa
385a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
385a4('bum): med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan
385a5('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
385a6('bum): chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag
385a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan
385b1('bum): ngag la rnam par spyod pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /
385b2('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang gos rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
385b3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod
385b4('bum): de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rin chen
385b5('bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
385b6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
385b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla
386a1('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod/
386a2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting
386a3('bum): nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams
386a4('bum): cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
386a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag
386a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
386a7('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par
386b1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o/ / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ti
386b2('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i
386b3('bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
386b4('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag
386b5('bum): par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

387a2('bum): mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
